Name: Champagne Snowball
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist and cacao powder.
POUR sparkling wine into chilled glass.
FINE STRAIN over sparkling wine in the glass.
Express lime zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Garnish with a dusting of cacao powder over the cocktail.
Review: Deliciously silky smooth, indulgent, and decadent. Rich, thick, and creamy advocaat freshened with dry sherry, zesty lime cordial, and invigorated with fizz.
History: The Snowball cocktail was huge in the 1970s and is now enjoying a well-deserved renaissance. This fizz-enhanced version is by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Champagne Snowball contains 223 calories
